survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Cafeteria Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the quality, variety, and overall satisfaction with the workplace cafeteria services to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the workplace cafeteria services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button format for single-choice responses. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How often do you use the workplace cafeteria services?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use the workplace cafeteria? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a checkbox format for multi-choice responses. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use the workplace cafeteria? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of food served in the workplace cafeteria?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', '3-4 times a week', or '1-2 times a week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale format for single-choice responses. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the workplace cafeteria services?
